title: Integrating Religious Studies and Social Sciences in Islamic Education: Simulation-Based Advanced Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of Islamic religious studies and understanding of social science theories
context.additional_context: Conducted in a virtual classroom environment utilizing learners' personal mobile devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain at least three strategies for integrating religious studies and social science theories within an Islamic educational context.
Learners will be able to design religious education scenarios applying social science research methodologies in a simulated environment.
Learners will analyze the effectiveness of integrated religion-social science education programs using VR-based assessment tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
